changes.old: ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Meta is a trusted partner to many organizations around the world.
changes.new: For example, we share information with Meta Companies that provide financial products and services to help them promote safety, security and integrity and comply with applicable law.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates that your data may now be shared with additional third parties, such as partners, advertisers, service providers, or group companies.
changes.suggested_action: Check which third parties are involved and whether you can opt out of certain types of sharing or limit data transfers in your account settings.

changes.new: Information you’ve shared through your device settings Location-related information Information about the network you connect your device to, including your IP address Information from cookies and similar technologies Information from partners, vendors and third parties
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates that your data may now be shared with additional third parties, such as partners, advertisers, service providers, or group companies.
changes.suggested_action: Check which third parties are involved and whether you can opt out of certain types of sharing or limit data transfers in your account settings.

changes.new: For example, our service providers do things like investigate suspicious activity and provide customer support.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates that your data may now be shared with additional third parties, such as partners, advertisers, service providers, or group companies.
changes.suggested_action: Check which third parties are involved and whether you can opt out of certain types of sharing or limit data transfers in your account settings.

changes.new: We use marketing vendors to deliver these ads.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates that your data may now be shared with additional third parties, such as partners, advertisers, service providers, or group companies.
changes.suggested_action: Check which third parties are involved and whether you can opt out of certain types of sharing or limit data transfers in your account settings.

changes.new: Just like you need a mailing address to receive a letter from a friend, your device needs an IP address to receive information on the internet.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates expanded tracking or behavioural analytics, which may be used for personalisation or profiling.
changes.suggested_action: Review privacy settings to limit tracking or analytics; disable personalised ads or restrict cookies if concerned.

changes.new: Certain ad blockers and tools to restrict cookies can interfere with your ability to opt out.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates expanded tracking or behavioural analytics, which may be used for personalisation or profiling.
changes.suggested_action: Review privacy settings to limit tracking or analytics; disable personalised ads or restrict cookies if concerned.

changes.new: Content you provide through our camera feature or your camera roll settings, or through our voice-enabled features Metadata about content Interactions with AI at Meta and related metadata.
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates expanded tracking or behavioural analytics, which may be used for personalisation or profiling.
changes.suggested_action: Review privacy settings to limit tracking or analytics; disable personalised ads or restrict cookies if concerned.

changes.new: If you don't have an account: You can use the Digital Advertising Alliance industry opt-out platform on your web browser.
changes.explanation: The updated policy introduces or expands the purposes for which your data is used (e.g., advertising, analytics, research) or clarifies the legal basis for processing.
changes.suggested_action: Check whether you are comfortable with these purposes and adjust consent/opt-out preferences where possible.

changes.new: If you live in Canada, you can use the Digital Advertising Alliance of Canada industry opt-out platform.
changes.explanation: The updated policy introduces or expands the purposes for which your data is used (e.g., advertising, analytics, research) or clarifies the legal basis for processing.
changes.suggested_action: Check whether you are comfortable with these purposes and adjust consent/opt-out preferences where possible.

changes.new: If we use your activity on our Products to tailor these ads, you can opt out of this type of use.
changes.explanation: The updated policy describes additional rights or controls you have over your personal data.
changes.suggested_action: Review the available rights and consider whether you wish to exercise any of them (e.g., deletion, opt-out).

changes.new: On some Products, you can use end-to-end encrypted messages.
changes.explanation: The updated policy describes new or enhanced security measures to protect your data.
changes.suggested_action: This may be protective. Still review the details to understand what changed.

changes.old: Meta leverages various tools to detect security bugs in its code base, as well as in open-source and third-party code, in order to mitigate or fix security bugs before they make it into shipped Meta’s products and impact our customers.
changes.new: Why and how we process your information: Promoting safety, integrity and security on and across the Meta Products: The Meta Products are designed to research and help ensure the safety, integrity and security of those services and those people who enjoy them, on and off Meta Products.
changes.explanation: This section of the policy text has been modified.
changes.suggested_action: Read this part of the policy carefully to understand how it affects your data.
